attributes.action:
Boycott the FIFA World Cup in Russia
and withdraw the England team.
attributes.additional_details: A foreign state deploying radioactive and possibly chemical weapons on British soil should not be tolerated. The UK should withdraw from any events hosted by such a criminal regime.
attributes.background:
The Russian state has assassinated people on British territory. Alexander Litvinenko was proved to have been poisoned with radioactive polonium by Russian agents.
There are numerous other deaths in the UK with links to the Russian regime including the recent nerve agent attack on Sergei Skripal.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

If you would like Government ministers to boycott the 2018 World Cup, you could start a new petition asking for that. 

The Government isn't responsible for the England football team, but your petition could ask the Government to urge the England team not to attend.
